name: Skullfest
description: You count skulltaking as an art rather than craft, polishing and brushing each headbone you took with extra diligence.

abilities.name: Skullfest
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, each time hero in the same chamber slays an adversary, they can roll a dice - on the roll of 6, they get an extra renown.

additionalEffect: an extra renown is gained on a roll of 5 or 6 instead of only on a 6.
